response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product, which I believe is worth more than $1,000,000 to you, has been carefully crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs and desires. My initial offer to you is $1,200,000. I understand that this might be a significant amount, but I assure you that the quality and benefits of the product far exceed its price. Please consider this offer thoughtfully and let me know if you would like to discuss further details or negotiate terms. I am confident that we can reach an agreement that satisfies both our interests.", "product_price": 1200000}
